title: PM, Asif Zardari discuss political situation, public welfare matters
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 23 (APP): President of Pakistan People’s Party Parliamentarians (PPPP) Asif Ali Zardari on Thursday met Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif here at the Prime Minister’s House.
On his arrival at the PM House, the prime minister received Asif Zardari, also the former President of Pakistan, a PM Office press release said.
In the meeting, they discussed the overall political situation and matters of public welfare.
